issue.title: [Python] Manylinux1 builds timing out in Travis CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Not sure why this is happening – I think the docker pull has been a lot slower of late

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3271?focusedCommentId=16621974) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
We could limit the manylinux1 builds to e.g. a single Python version to improve the build times. They are quite important as they are the lower bound in the compiler versions that we support.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3271?focusedCommentId=16624730) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This seems to have been a transient problem
